snippet: Curtis Granderson hit a go-ahead two-run homer, David Wright had four R.B.I. and Noah Syndergaard pitched six innings as the Mets bounced back after two road losses.
abstract: New York Mets defeat Kansas City Royals, 9-3, in Game 3 of World Series; Royals lead series, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: Curtis Granderson hit a go-ahead two-run homer, David Wright had four R.B.I. and Noah Syndergaard pitched six innings as the Mets bounced back after two road losses.

headline.print_headline: Back Home and Back in It
headline.main: Back Home and Back in It, Mets Rout Royals in Game 3 of World Series
